Class GraphicalView

java.lang.Object
com.pld.agile.view.GraphicalView

public class GraphicalView extends Object implements Observer
Class handling the graphical view of the model.

  • Constructor Details

    • GraphicalView

      public GraphicalView(Window window)
      GraphicalView constructor. Adds observers on the model objects, populates the graphical components, Sets size bindings and adds resizing listeners.
      Parameters:
      window - The application's Window instance.

  • Method Details

    • projectLatLon

      public double[] projectLatLon(Intersection intersection)
      Projects an intersection's (lat; lon) address to a pixel coordinate based on the container's size and the mapData's bounds.
      Parameters:
      intersection - The intersection whose address to project.
      Returns:
      A double[] containing the {x, y} projection.

    • update

      public void update(Observable o, UpdateType updateType)
      Updates the views whenever the model notifies a change.
      Specified by:
      update in interface Observer
      Parameters:
      o - The observable object who notified the view.
      updateType - The type of update that has been made.
